cyclone.name: CRISTOBAL
cyclone.current_location: about 95 mi (155 km) west of Campeche, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Meandering in the southern Bay of Campeche through Thursday, then forecast to drift northward toward the central Gulf of Mexico late in the 5-day period
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southern Bay of Campeche coast between Campeche and Veracruz, Mexico

weather_observation.watch_coast: None affecting U.S.; Tropical Storm Warning in Mexico from Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz
weather_observation.warning_coast: Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz, Mexico (Tropical Storm Warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southern Bay of Campeche and adjacent Mexican coastline
